rules.description: Capslock: q, w, e, r, t (quote, double quote, equal, return, tilde)
Capslock: y, u, i, o, p (none, underscore, escape, slash, plus)
Capslock: a, s, d, f, g (control , option, command, fn, grave)
CapsLock: h, j, k, l, ; (left, up, down, right, colon)
Capslock: z, x, c, v, b (none, asterisk, caret, vertical pipe, backslash)
Capslock: spacebar, tab, quote (backspace, delete_forward, close_brace)
CapsLock: set to modifier, if alone (caps_lock)
